text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/631e8f93458b102091d54c502f489c03e454d4da|patch 8.2.1953: Vim9: extra "unknown" error after other error>
patch 8.2.1953: Vim9: extra "unknown" error after other error

Problem:    Vim9: extra "unknown" error after other error.
Solution:   Restore did_emsg count after EXEC instruction. (closes #7254)
            Improve error message from assert_fails()

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1953: Vim9: extra "unknown" error after other error · vim/vim@631e8f9
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1953: Vim9: extra "unknown" error after other error · vim/vim@631e8f9
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: extra "unknown" error after other error. Solution: Restore did_emsg count after EXEC instruction. (closes #7254) Improve error message from assert_fails()

patch 8.2.1952: Vim9: crash when using a NULL dict key

Problem:    Vim9: crash when using a NULL dict key.
Solution:   Use a NULL dict key like an empty string. (closes #7249)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.1952: Vim9: crash when using a NULL dict key · vim/vim@c7f7f6d
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: crash when using a NULL dict key. Solution: Use a NULL dict key like an empty string. (closes #7249)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/348be7ed07d164970ec0004bc278e254eb0cf5bf|patch 8.2.1949: Vim9: using extend() on null dict is silently ignored>
patch 8.2.1949: Vim9: using extend() on null dict is silently ignored

Problem:    Vim9: using extend() on null dict is silently ignored.
Solution:   Give an error message.  Initialize a dict variable with an empty
            dictionary. (closes #7251)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1949: Vim9: using extend() on null dict is silently ignored · vim/vim@348be7e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1949: Vim9: using extend() on null dict is silently ignored · vim/vim@348be7e
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: using extend() on null dict is silently ignored. Solution: Give an error message. Initialize a dict variable with an empty dictionary. (closes #7251)

patch 8.2.1948: GUI: crash when handling message while closing a window

Problem:    GUI: crash when handling message while closing a window. (Srinath
            Avadhanula)
Solution:   Don't handle message while closing a window. (closes #7250)

attachments.text: Problem: GUI: crash when handling message while closing a window. (Srinath Avadhanula) Solution: Don't handle message while closing a window. (closes #7250)

Solution:   Check for at least one fold. (closes #7245)

patch 8.2.1945: crash when passing NULL function to reduce()

Problem:    Crash when passing NULL function to reduce().
Solution:   Check for NULL pointer and give an error. (Dominique Pellé,
            closes #7243)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1945: crash when passing NULL function to reduce() · vim/vim@0d90e72
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1945: crash when passing NULL function to reduce() · vim/vim@0d90e72
attachments.text: Problem: Crash when passing NULL function to reduce(). Solution: Check for NULL pointer and give an error. (Dominique Pellé, closes #7243)
